titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: SUBSTANCE USE IN THE LAST THREE MONTHS INDICATOR (GAMMAHYDROXYBUTYRATE OR GAMMABUTYROLACTONE) - Description

div.p: SUBSTANCE USE IN THE LAST THREE MONTHS INDICATOR (GAMMAHYDROXYBUTYRATE OR GAMMABUTYROLACTONE) is the same as attribute SUBSTANCE USE IN THE LAST THREE MONTHS INDICATOR, to indicate whether the PERSON has used the SUBSTANCE Gammahydroxybutyrate or Gammabutyrolactone in the last three months.
